Package VMF

Class Slot

java.lang.Object
VMF.Slot
Direct Known Subclasses:
FrmSlot
public class Slot extends Object
The VendingMachineFactory.Slot class represents a slot in an inventory system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    protected
    Slot(Item item, int itemQuant, int slotCap)
    Constructs a new VendingMachineFactory.Slot object with the specified item, quantity, and capacity.

    • Slot

      protected Slot(Item item, int itemQuant, int slotCap)
      Constructs a new VendingMachineFactory.Slot object with the specified item, quantity, and capacity.
      Parameters:
      item - the item associated with the slot
      itemQuant - the initial quantity of the item in the slot
      slotCap - the capacity of the slot

      public boolean addQuantity(int addStock)
      Adds the specified quantity of items to the slot.
      Parameters:
      addStock - the quantity of items to add
      Returns:
